purpose: Enable users to create and manage AI workflows without coding, facilitating integration with AI agents
principle: Uses a visual interface to allow users to design workflows by connecting nodes, which represent tasks or actions, in a sequence
reusability: Offers a modular design with reusable workflow nodes, supports integration with AI agents through a visual interface
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and potential bugs, primarily focused on users familiar with AI concepts
name: vector-vein
description: No-code AI workflow. Drag and drop workflow nodes and use your workflow with your AI agents.
highlight: No-code AI workflow creation with drag-and-drop interface for AI agents
